The video was published on Twitter on Oc: 2019, and quickly gained over 1.2 million views within six hours.
The video purportedly showed the Trump I: owned by US President Donald Trump's Trump Organization.
The video displayed a banner hanging on: BETRAYED AND MURDERED THE KURDISH PEOPLE. Greenpeace." Additionally, people chanting phrases such as "not my president" and "Trump this shit" could be heard in the background.
The video was proven to be doctored: as confirmed by Greenpeace, who stated that it was a computer-generated animation and not executed by their organization.
